projectGridLines.title: Backend Development (Node.js, Nest.js, Typescript)
projectGridLines.description:
2025 graduates from B.Tech or similar course with CGPA of 7.5 and above

? You have a background in backend development, particularly with Node.js and TypeScript.

Experience with Sequelize and PostgreSQL is viewed favorably.

? A genuine interest in backend development and eagerness to engage with all aspects of SaaS

platform development.

? The ability to learn new technologies and frameworks as required.

? Experience with or willingness to learn about various storage backends like PostgreSQL, Redis, etc.

? A proactive approach to code writing, reading, and review.

? An agile mindset with the capacity to prioritize and make decisive product decisions.
